tn.text: The "standards" were four larger groups that the tribes were divided into. Each standard was commanded to camp together. The standards was represented by a banner.

tn.ref: with the banners of their fathers' houses
tn.text: Each extended family also had a banner under with the camp, which was within the area designated for their standard.
A banner is a large flag.

The "standards" were four larger groups that the tribes were divided into. Each standard was commanded to camp together, and was represented by a banner. See how you translated "standards" in [[:en:bible:notes:num:02:01|2:2]].
Translate this man's name the same way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:07|1:7]].
"seventy-four thousand and six hundred" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
Translate this man's name the same way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:07|1:8]].
This is a military term for a large group of soldiers. Each tribe was its own "division."
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
Translate this man's name the same way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:07|1:9]].
This modifies men. AT: "57,400 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])

tn.ref: All the number of the camp of Judah is 186,400
tn.text: This number includes all of the men in the tribes that camped under the standard of Judah. AT: "The number of the men camped under the standard of Judah is 186,400" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
This means that they will set out first when the Israelite camp moves. AT: "When travelling, they will set out first" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
"1st" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

The "standards" were four larger groups that the tribes were divided into. Each standard was commanded to camp together. The standards were represented by a banner. See how you translated "standards" in [[:en:bible:notes:num:02:01|2:2]].
Translate this man's name the same way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:04|1:5]].
This modifies men. AT: "46,500 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
Translate this man's name the same way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:04|1:6]].
This modifies men. AT: "59,300 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
Translate this man's name the say way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:12|1:14]].
This modifies men. AT: "45,650 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])

tn.ref: All those numbered in the camp of Reuben, according to their divisions, is 151,450
tn.text: This number includes all of the men in the tribes that camped under the standard of Reuben. AT: "The number of all the men camped under the standard of Reuben, according to their divisions, is 151,450" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
"2nd" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

tn.ref: the tent of meeting must go out ... in the middle of all the camps
tn.text: This means that the tent of meeting must be carried by the Levites in the middle of the tribes as they travel.
"They" refers to the twelve tribes.
Each man does not have his own personal banner; rather, this refers to the banner belonging to his tribe. AT: "by his tribe's banner" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

The "standards" were four larger groups that the tribes were divided into. Each standard was commanded to camp together. The standards were represented by a banner. See how you translated "standards" in [[:en:bible:notes:num:02:01|2:2]].
This modifies men. AT: "40,500 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
This means that the tribe of Manasseh will set out next, after the tribe of Ephraim.
This modifies men. AT: "32,200 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
Translate this man's name the say way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:10|1:11]].
This modifies men. AT: "35,400 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

tn.ref: All those numbered in the camp of Ephraim is 108,100
tn.text: This number includes all of the men in the tribes that camped under the standard of Ephraim. AT: "The number of the men camped under the standard of Ephraim is 108,100" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
"3rd" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

tn.ref: the divisions of the camp of Dan
tn.text: The this refers to the divisions of Dan, Asher, and Naphthali that are under the standard of Dan. AT: "the divisions that camp under the standard of Dan" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
Translate this man's name the say way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:12|1:12]].
This modifies men. AT: "62,700 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
Translate this man's name the say way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:12|1:13]].
This modifies men. AT: "41,500 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
Translate this man's name the say way that you did in [[:en:bible:notes:num:01:12|1:15]].
This modifies men. AT: "53,400 men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
Yahweh continues telling Moses where each tribe and its army will camp around the tent of meeting. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

tn.ref: All those numbered in the camp with Dan is 157,600
tn.text: This number includes all of the men in the tribes that camped under the standard of Dan. AT: "The number of the men camped under the standard of Dan is 157,600" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
All those counted This can be stated in active form. AT: "Moses and Aaron counted them all" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
Here "their" refers to the people of Israel.

tn.ref: They went out from the camp
tn.text: This refers to when they would travel to another place. AT: "When they traveled, they went out from the camp" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
